  1. Substitute data from the example here to fit a modelâ€¦

    https://codepen.io/tfjs-book/pen/JmerMM

    ////
// Data
////
function shuffle(data, target) {
  let counter = data.length
  let temp = 0
  let index = 0
  while (counter > 0) {
    index = (Math.random() * counter) | 0
    counter--

    temp = data[counter]
    data[counter] = data[index]
    data[index] = temp

    temp = target[counter]
    target[counter] = target[index]
    target[index] = temp
  }
}
let trainFeatures = [
  407,
  413,
  420,
  438,
  440,
  441,
  442,
  444,
  449,
  450,
  329,

]

  -5,

const trainShuffled = shuffle(trainFeatures, trainTarget)
const testShuffled = shuffle(testFeatures, testTarget)
const trainData = {
  sizeMB: trainFeatures,
  timeSec: trainTarget,
}
const testData = {
  sizeMB: testFeatures,
  timeSec: testTarget,
}
